CustomField.description: If the number of days between the conversation start date and opportunity created date is less-than-or-equal-to the Influenced Look-Back Period, and the conversation happened prior to the opportunity close date, the value will be set to true. The Influenced Look-Back Period can be changed in Setup > Custom Settings > Drift Settings.
CustomField.formula: IF ( AND ( DATEVALUE( DriftData__Opportunity__r.CreatedDate ) - DATEVALUE (DriftData__Drift_Conversation__r.DriftData__Conversation_Start_Time__c) <= DriftData__Drift_Conversation__r.DriftData__Influenced_Look_Back_Period_fx__c, DriftData__Opportunity__r.CloseDate - DATEVALUE(DriftData__Drift_Conversation__r.DriftData__Conversation_Start_Time__c) > 0 ), true, false )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If the number of days between the conversation start date and opportunity created date is less-than-or-equal-to the Influenced Look-Back Period, and the conversation happened prior to the opportunity close date, the value will be set to true. The Influenced Look-Back Period can be changed in Setup > Custom Settings > Drift Settings.
CustomField.label: Influenced By Drift
